rule: Each description must include a portrayal of the background, outlining the setting or environment in which the subjects are situated.
input: The background features a serene mountain landscape with rolling hills, a clear blue lake, and pine forests stretching into the distance.
coverage: A serene mountain landscape featuring rolling green hills, a clear blue lake reflecting the sky, and dense pine forests stretching into the distance. Captured during the early morning with soft, golden sunlight filtering through the trees, casting gentle shadows across the scene. The background showcases majestic mountain peaks under a tranquil, pastel-colored sky. The overall atmosphere evokes peace and tranquility, inviting viewers to experience the natural beauty and calmness of the untouched wilderness.
validityText:
The input is a natural language description written in English, consists of a single paragraph, and contains only 23 words, which does not exceed the 80-word limit.

OK
